      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application that return Application 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Application Application.addAuthorizedCallbackUri(String authorizedCallbackUri)
      Adds a valid URI as an authorized callback URI for this application.
      Application Application.addAuthorizedOriginUri(String authorizedOriginUri)
      Adds a valid URI as an authorized origin URI for this application.
      Application CreateApplicationRequest.getApplication()
      Returns the Application instance for which a new record will be created in Stormpath.
      Application ApplicationAccountStoreMapping.getApplication()
      Returns the Application represented by this ApplicationAccountStoreMapping resource.
      Application Application.saveWithResponseOptions(ApplicationOptions responseOptions)
      Saves this Application resource and ensures the returned Application response reflects the specified options.
      Application Application.setAuthorizedCallbackUris(List<String> authorizedCallbackUris)
      Sets the list of Authorized Callback URIs for this application.
      Application Application.setAuthorizedOriginUris(List<String> authorizedOriginUris)
      Sets the list of Authorized Origin URIs for this application.
      Application Application.setDescription(String description)
      Sets the application description.
      Application Application.setName(String name)
      Sets the application's name.
      Application Application.setStatus(ApplicationStatus status)
      Sets the application's status.
      Methods in com.stormpath.sdk.application with parameters of type Application 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ApiRequestAuthenticator Applications.apiRequestAuthenticator(Application application)
      Creates a new ApiRequestAuthenticator instance for authenticating API requests for the given application
      static CreateApplicationRequestBuilder Applications.newCreateRequestFor(Application application)
      Creates a new CreateApplicationRequestBuilder instance reflecting the specified Application instance.
      static OAuthApiRequestAuthenticator Applications.oauthRequestAuthenticator(Application application)
      Creates a new OAuthApiRequestAuthenticator instance for authenticating Oauth-based API requests for the given application
